content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is about the payment of costs and it started on september 30 2015 and ended on june 9 2017 the final resolution involves dividing a real estate property worth 50000 eur between two exspouses the plaintiff will receive half of the value while the defendant has to pay the remaining 50000 eur the decision was made based on a specific law called the civil procedure act section 306 the details of the court settlement are confidential and there is no translation available for this document
